short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension that notifies you when a question goes live in your TopHat class.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TopHat Question Notifier is a Chrome extension designed for students using the TopHat platform during lectures. The extension automatically monitors the ‘Classroom’ tab within your TopHat class and sends a desktop notification whenever a new poll or question goes live, ensuring you never miss an important class activity.

Key Features:

- Real-time notifications: Get notified the moment a poll or question becomes available, even if you’re multitasking in another tab.
- Seamless integration: The extension runs silently in the background while you are on the TopHat Classroom page, requiring minimal setup from the user.
- Easy to use: Simply keep your TopHat class open in the Classroom tab, and the extension will do the rest.

This tool is perfect for students who want to stay on top of live polls and questions during lectures without constantly monitoring the TopHat page. Keep up with your class effortlessly and ensure that you never miss interactive moments during your lecture.
